creator: CardsPal
descriptionHtml:
CardsPal discovers credit card deals & offers to maximise your savings and earn cashback on your credit cards, to help you manage spending within your budget and save money. We aggregate all vendors and merchants so that you never miss out on opportunities. Manage all your credit cards in one place, and never miss a deal again.

⭐️How does CardsPal work?

• Add your credit cards to CardsPal (no credit card or personal details required).
• CardsPal manages all credit cards in one place and aggregates all possible rewards available to you in the area
• Search & discover a variety of deals in Singapore for various categories such as food, dining, groceries, shopping, travel, entertainment, lifestyle and many more.
• Compare credit cards and available deals for each merchant.

We support all Singapore bank issued credit cards - Standard Chartered (Stanchart), HSBC, UOB, DBS, POSB, OCBC, Citi, CIMB, Maybank, BOC and ICBC credit cards, as well as American Express (AMEX) cards.

💳Online - Discover the rewards and benefits from online purchases via CardsPal from the likes of Sephora, Foodpanda, Deliveroo, Grab, AliExpress, Lazada, Love, Bonito and more. Maximise your cashback on your online shopping cards like the DBS Live Fresh Card, UOB Lady’s Card, CIMB Visa Signature and many others. Shop online, save money, and be sure not to bust your budget with CardsPal!

🍛Dining - All-day discounts for your breakfast, brunch, lunch or dinner. Craving hawker food, pizza, pasta, sushi or prata? Feed your hunger and save money through nearby dining deals available for you. What’s more, use these deals in conjunction with your DBS, UOB, Standard Chartered, HSBC, Citi, AMEX, CIMB, Maybank, BOC and ICBC cards to maximise your savings.

🛍Shopping - Got a budget for your next spree? Check out the latest fashion, electronics, cosmetics, health & wellness, home appliances, babies & toys, watches, bags, accessories, automotive, sports, lifestyle and more category deals available via partners, so you will never miss out on offers around you. Explore the deals available on your CIMB Platinum Mastercard, Stanchart Unlimited Cashback, AMEX Capitacard, Citi Rewards Card, ICBC Horoscope, BOC Qoo10 card and many others to get more value!

📽Entertainment – YOLO, live it up! Movies, concerts, exhibitions, parades, shows and other deals you love, all in one app. Stack these deals with your UOB YOLO, HSBC Revolution, Maybank Platinum Visa, AMEX Platinum credit card and many more, to save money and upsize your rewards.

🧘Wellness, Fitness & Sports – When life gives you lemons, it better be lululemon! Need the latest sportswear for F45? We’ve got you. Discover your card benefits for purchases for marathons, fitness gear, apparel and more.

🛒Retail - Keen to get know your eligible card discounts from NTUC Fair Price, Cold Storage, Giant, Sheng Siong and more? Check out the latest offers in our app. What’s more, stack these deals with your credit card rewards such as UOB One, POSB Everyday, OCBC 365, Maybank Family & Friends, BOC Sheng Siong credit card and many more, to save money!

✈️ Travel – Miles junkie? Krisflyer miles (and other frequent flyer programmes), airlines, hotels and many more offers available. Explore deals from your Citi Premiermiles, OCBC Voyage, DBS Altitude, UOB PRVI Miles, AMEX Krisflyer, BOC Elite Miles credit card, and you could quickly scoot off for your next getaway!

💰Increase your savings, earn cashback & save money, maximise your budget, find tips on personal finance hacks & utilise the full potential of credit card programmes.

Ready to get the best credit card rewards and save money? Never miss a deal again. Download the CardsPal app, sign up for your free account, and start enjoying the benefits you deserve!

-----------------------

👍Like us on Facebook (fb.com/cardspal) and follow on Instagram (@cardspal) for the latest news, rewards, deals, offers and more!

Have a question or need help?
Talk to us at
support@cardspal.com

Never miss a deal again with CardsPal. Update your app now to see what we have in store for you!🎁

title: CardsPal: Credit Card Deals to Manage Spending

creator: CardsPal
descriptionHtml:
CardsPal is Singapore’s favourite lifestyle app which discovers the best deals & offers to maximise your savings, help you manage spending within your budget and save money. Manage all your cards in one place, and never miss a deal again. What’s more, get exclusive deals from us!

⭐️ How does CardsPal work?

• Add your cards to CardsPal – from credit, debit to loyalty cards, we have them all! (no credit card or personal details required).

• CardsPal manages all your cards in one place and aggregates all possible rewards available to you in the area

• Search & discover a variety of deals and rewards in Singapore for various categories such as food, dining, groceries, shopping, travel, entertainment, lifestyle and many more.

• Compare cards and available deals for each merchant.

• Enjoy the savings and make the most out of your wallet!

Psst… You can also watch out for exclusive campaigns, only available on CardsPal!

We take pride in having a wide card coverage, from credit, debit, to loyalty cards. On top of PAssion card, Plus! and SAFRA card, we support all Singapore bank issued credit & debit cards - Stanchart, HSBC, UOB, DBS, POSB, OCBC, Citi, CIMB, Maybank, BOC and ICBC credit cards, as well as American Express (AMEX) cards. We also support GrabPay, YouTrip, Fevo, TransferWise, UnionPay, JCB cards.

💳Online - Discover the rewards and benefits from online purchases via CardsPal from the likes of Sephora, Foodpanda, Deliveroo, Grab, Lazada, and more. Shop online, save money, and be sure not to bust your budget with CardsPal!

🍛Dining - All-day discounts for your breakfast, brunch, lunch or dinner. Craving hawker food, pizza, pasta, sushi or prata? Feed your hunger and save money through nearby dining deals available for you. What’s more, use these deals in conjunction with your credit, debit & loyalty cards to maximise your savings.

🛍Shopping - Check out the latest fashion, electronics, cosmetics, health & wellness, home appliances, babies & toys, watches, bags, accessories, lifestyle and more category deals available. Explore the deals available on your CIMB Platinum Mastercard, Stanchart Unlimited Cashback, AMEX Capitacard, Citi Rewards Card, ICBC Horoscope, BOC Qoo10 card, Transferwise card and many others to get more value!

📽Entertainment – YOLO, live it up! Movies, concerts, shows, Razer goods and other deals you love, all in one app. Ignite your passion and stack these deals with your UOB YOLO, HSBC Revolution, Maybank Platinum Visa, AMEX Platinum credit card, SAFRA and many more, to save money and upsize your rewards.

🧘Wellness, Fitness & Sports – When life gives you lemons, it better be lululemon! Need the latest sportswear for F45? We’ve got you. Discover your card benefits for purchases for marathons, fitness gear, apparel and more.

🛒Retail - Keen to get know your card discounts from NTUC Fair Price, Cold Storage, Giant, Sheng Siong and more? What’s more, stack these deals with your other card rewards such as UOB One, POSB Everyday, OCBC 365, Maybank Family & Friends, BOC Sheng Siong, PAssion cards and many more, to save money!

✈️ Travel – Krisflyer miles, airlines, hotels and many more offers available. Explore deals from your Citi Premiermiles, OCBC Voyage, DBS Altitude, UOB PRVI Miles, AMEX Krisflyer, BOC Elite Miles, YouTrip or Transferwise credit card, and you could quickly scoot off for your next getaway!

💰Increase your savings, maximise your budget, find tips on personal finance hacks & utilise the full potential of the cards in your wallet.

Ready to get the best card rewards and save money? Never miss a deal again. Download the CardsPal app, sign up for your free account, and start enjoying the benefits you deserve!

--------------------------
👍Like us on Facebook (fb.com/CardsPalOfficial) and follow on Instagram (@cardspal) for the latest news, rewards, deals, offers and more!

Have a question or need help?
Talk to us at support@cardspal.com

title: CardsPal: Credit Card Rewards & Lifestyle Deals

creator: CardsPal
descriptionHtml:
Get personalised and unbiased recommendations for credit card, food, lifestyle deals, and many more - All in 1 app, within your fingertip!

What’s more, you get to enjoy priority access to CardsPal exclusive deals!

• Be the first to choose from a wide variety of deals and rewards - dining, shopping, leisure and more, plus exclusive campaigns and merchant deals

• Smart recommendation of credit cards based on your lifestyles and purchases. Our smart technology helps you to calculate your estimated rewards so you are empowered to make better decisions.

We empower you to make smart financial choices - from credit, debit, to loyalty cards. On top of PAssion card, Plus! and SAFRA card, we support all Singapore bank issued credit & debit cards - Stanchart Chartered Bank, HSBC, UOB, DBS, POSB, OCBC, Citi, CIMB, Maybank, BOC and ICBC credit cards, as well as American Express (AMEX) cards. We also support GrabPay, YouTrip, Fevo, TransferWise, UnionPay, JCB cards.

Deal categories:

🛍️ Online – Retail therapy at its best! Discover deals and rewards at brands like Shopee, Foodpanda, Deliveroo, Grab, Lazada, and more.

🍔 Dining – Be a foodie who saves. Get deals for all your cravings, whether it’s takeaway or dining in (filtered by geo-location too!).

🛒 Shopping – Shop savvily with the latest fashion, electronics, health & wellness, home appliances, accessories, and other lifestyle deals here.

🤪 Entertainment – YOLO, live it up! Catch a movie, visit local attractions in Singapore or play your heart out at entertainment spots without bruising your wallet.

💓Wellness – Up your health points with supplements, medical promos, and spas sessions, all for less!

🗺️ Travel – Our cruise discounts, staycations and hotel buffet deals are a must-have for your next vacation.

Let CardsPal boost your savings and make the best use of your dollar.

Download the CardsPal app, create a free account, and dive into a world of deals, savings and rewards!
